title: Trump’s Dream Team, entert(AI)nment 1.21.20
itunes:title: Trump’s Dream Team, entert(AI)nment 1.21.20
description:
In episode 552, Jack and Miles are joined by the Scam Goddess Laci Mosley to discuss Kellyanne Conway claiming Trump is innocent, Trump adding more lawyers to his team, Boeing releasing some shady internal messages, NBC's new streaming service, 1 Million Moms coming for Burger King, Hollywood using AI to decide which movies to make, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. WATCH: Conway calls Dems' latest impeachment antics 'embarrassing' and 'desperate'
  2. Trump Impeachment Team Will Include Ken Starr, Alan Dershowitz
  3. Boeing releases internal messages on 737 MAX, calls them 'completely unacceptable"
  4. Boeing Employees Mocked F.A.A. and ‘Clowns’ Who Designed 737 Max
  5. NBC’s Peacock streaming service will launch on July 15th with three different price tiers
  6. A conservative moms group has a beef with Burger King — and the ‘d-word’
  7. Burger King Continues to Cross the Line
  8. HOLLYWOOD IS QUIETLY USING AI TO HELP DECIDE WHICH MOVIES TO MAKE
  9. Warner Bros. Signs Deal for AI-Driven Film Management System (Exclusive)
  10. WATCH: GARY LOW - You are a danger

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
